snippet: Rafael Nadal resumed his championship-winning ways on his favorite surface by taking the Madrid Masters 1000. But the runner-up, Kei Nishikori, had to retire.
abstract: Rafael Nadal wins Madrid Masters 1000 tennis tournament after opponent Kei Nishikori retires with back injury; victory ensures that Nadal will keep his No 1 ranking and it is also a confidence builder as Nadal heads in to the French Open, where he will be seeking his record ninth title.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal resumed his championship-winning ways on his favorite surface by taking the Madrid Masters 1000. But the runner-up, Kei Nishikori, had to retire.

headline.main: Nadal Picks Up a Clay Title in Madrid, but the Victory Is Short of Convincing
headline.print_headline: Nadal Picks Up a Clay Title in Madrid, but the Victory Is Short of Convincing
